row.process:
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ) ELSE ( :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR ) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX" execcode=$? if [ $execcode -eq 0 ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO else : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR fi if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then exit $execcode fi :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
